title: Uzbek Minister arrives Islamabad for OIC special moot on Afghanistan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 18 (APP):Uzbekistan’s Transport Minister Ilkham Makhkamov arrived in Islamabad on Saturday to attend 17th extraordinary session of OIC Council of Foreign Ministers.
The special moot of Organization of Islamic Cooperation (OIC) is scheduled to take place here on Sunday to discuss humanitarian situation in Afghanistan.
Pakistan’s Ambassador to Vienna Aftab Ahmad Khokher received the Uzbek minister along with a high-level delegation at a red carpet rolled out in their honour.
